data.message: I seem to be seeing more and more ads or things the program thinks I'd like and less of the whole reason I am on facebook which is to see what's going on with family and friends.  The ads take up more room on the side and in the content.  these changes just help me to free myself from this addiction.

replies.message: Same here, since they did this, I have been on facebook less because it's so annoying, page scrolls so very slow after a few minutes on line, sick of suggested pages every time I like something.
I hate the nonsense on my page that I did not solicit, myself!!!  Do not "suggest" pages to me... I am smart enough to find what I like all on my own!!  :)
that's what I'm talking about Pamela!!
mine scrolls fine, fast. might try Chrome
I have noticed that the page scrolls very slow also and that I have had trouble downloading things. Isthat what FB calls "changing things'?
most of us don't like 'change' and I certainly agree with others that the only setting I want is most recent, since you have no idea what is important to any of us.
The advertising scrolling on the side is SO annoying HATE it.
That is how they keep this site free. There are a good many other social sites to choose from.
